DataListSpec.Name: Constituent Active Child Sponsorships Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Displays active child sponsorships for a constituent
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CONSTITUENTACTIVECHILDSPONSORSHIPS(@CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier) as set nocount on;
select financialsponsor.ID as FINANCIALSPONSORID, correspondent.ID as CORRESPONDENTID, sp.ID as SPONSORSHIPID, rev.ID as SPONSORSHIPRECURRINGGIFTID, sp.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, spc.LOOKUPID as COMMITMENTLOOKUPID, so.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME as CHILDNAME, statusCode.DESCRIPTION as SPONSORSHIPSTATUS, sp.STARTDATE, coalesce (slocation.LOOKUPID,'') as PROJECTLOOKUPID, so.ELIGIBILITY, so_child.GENDER, so_child.BIRTHDATE, so_child.AGE, so_child_ext.CURRENTPROGRAMCOMPLETIONDATE, rev.Amount as RGAMOUNT, revschedule.FREQUENCY, case when revschedule.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE > revschedule.ENDDATE then null else revschedule.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE end as NTD, dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(rev.ID, null) as PASTDUEAMOUNT, (select top 1 coalesce([PAYMENT].TRANSACTIONAMOUNT, 0) from dbo.RECURRINGGIFTACTIVITY as [RGA] join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM as [PAYMENT] on [PAYMENT].ID = [RGA].PAYMENTREVENUEID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION as [REVPAYMENT] on [PAYMENT].FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID = [REVPAYMENT].ID where SOURCEREVENUEID = rev.ID -- I removed this beause it might be good to know the last payment was refunded -- and [REVPAYMENT].TRANSACTIONAMOUNT > 0 order by [REVPAYMENT].DATE desc) as LASTPAYMENTAMOUNT,
(select top 1 cast (rev_payment.DATE as date) from dbo.RECURRINGGIFTACTIVITY rg_act join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM as payment on payment.ID = rg_act.PAYMENTREVENUEID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION as rev_payment on payment.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID = rev_payment.ID where SOURCEREVENUEID = rev.ID -- I removed this beause it might be good to know the last payment was refunded -- and rev_payment.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT > 0 order by rev_payment.DATE desc) as LASTPAYMENTDATE,
PAYMENTMETHOD, case when dbo.USR_UFN_CHECK_RECURRINGGIFT_ISHELD(sp.REVENUESPLITID) = 1 then 'Yes' else '' end as ISHELD, case when financialsponsor.ID <> correspondent.ID then 'Yes' else 'No' end as ISGIFTSPONSORSHIP, correspondent.LOOKUPID as CORRESPONDENTLOOKUPID, correspondent.NAME as CORRESPONDENTNAME
from dbo.SPONSORSHIP sp inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT spc on sp.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = spc.ID inner join dbo.REVENUESPLIT revsplit on sp.REVENUESPLITID = revsplit.ID inner join dbo.REVENUE rev on revsplit.REVENUEID = rev.ID inner join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE revschedule on revschedule.ID = rev.ID --REVENUE.ID inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT financialsponsor on rev.CONSTITUENTID = financialsponsor.ID inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT correspondent on sp.CONSTITUENTID = correspondent.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = sp.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = sp.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID inner join dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION so_child_ext on so_child.ID = so_child_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID left join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION se on se.ID = sp.ID left join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE statusCode on statusCode.ID = se.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID and statusCode.DESCRIPTION in ('Sponsored', 'Prospect Sponsored', 'Unpaid Sponsored') inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = slocation.ID inner join dbo.REVENUEPAYMENTMETHOD rev_paymethod on rev_paymethod.REVENUEID = revsplit.REVENUEID
where sp.STATUSCODE = 1 and financialsponsor.ID = @CONTEXTID
